laesse Loridiel was an elven traveler in the mid-to-late 14 century DR who briefly stayed in Thentia, with disastrous results.
Although she was initially very fond of the bard Mendryll Belarod, their relationship quickly turned sour after he helped cause her unicorn companion to abandon her.
In the , she was traveling the Moonsea and stayed a time in Thentia. She stabled her faithful unicorn steed at Angryms Livery, and while at The Inlet, spent a night with fellow traveler Mendryll Belarod. The following morning she was distraught to discover that her unicorn companion had deserted her and disappeared.
